Class Question

    • Ciencias.Core.Question

  • public class Question
extends java.lang.Object
    An objective representation of a question.
    Version:
    2/21/2014
    Author:
    Paul Alves

    • Constructor Detail

      • Question

        public Question(int pQNum,
        java.lang.String pQText,
        java.lang.String pQType,
        java.lang.String pQTag,
        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> pQAnswers,
        int pMaxAnswers,
        java.lang.String img)
        Constructs a Question
        Parameters:
        pQNum - The Question number
        pQText - The Question text
        pQType - The question type
        pQTag - The Question tag (pass "None" for the default tag)
        pQAnswers - The Question answers as an arraylist
        pMaxAnswers - The maximum amount of answers a question can have
        img - path to an image to display in the viewer. (pass "None" for no image)
